name: Get the attribute of a concept
description: Retrieves attributes associated with a given classname.
example_questions: Show me the attributes of [class name]
Show me the attributes of [class name 1], [class name 2], and [class name 3]
Get the similar attributes of [class name 1] and [class name 2]
Get the different attributes of [class name 1] and [class name 2]

action_list.content: Using the implemented function of get_attributes, create the code to get the attributes of [class name]
Execute the code to get the attributes of [class name]
From the results, what are the attributes of [class name]?
